title: Travel Vista
description: A hackathon project developed for the Richfield Hackathon, integrating Trip Advisor API to help travelers plan trips with access to flights, hotels, restaurants, and attractions.
As team lead and front-end developer, managed project execution and mentored team members in Angular development while implementing responsive design with Tailwind CSS.

timeline.description: Led project planning and technology stack selection, transitioning from PHP/MySQL to Angular/MongoDB based on hackathon requirements. Established foundational styling and mobile-responsive framework.
Integrated Tailwind CSS for streamlined styling, completed homepage template, and assigned development tasks to team members based on Figma designs and individual skill levels.
Implemented core features: Trip Advisor API integration for travel searches, user account management with wallet functionality, dark/light mode toggle, and comprehensive travel exploration interface.

title: Social Media Platform
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive social media network inspired by major platforms like Facebook and Instagram. The platform connects individuals and businesses with features for content sharing, user interaction, and community building.
Built with PHP and MySQL for robust backend functionality, and Docker for containerized deployment ensuring scalability and consistent environments.

timeline.description: Designed platform architecture incorporating user profiles, content feeds, messaging systems, and business pages based on analysis of existing social media platforms.
Implemented core functionality using PHP and MySQL for user authentication, post management, friend connections, and data persistence.
Configured Docker containers for consistent development and deployment environments, simplifying setup and ensuring application portability.
